|brand = eero |model = Beacon |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (D010001) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = range extender, mesh node |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AEM4-D010001 |icid = 20613-91661170 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4019; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 716 <!-- 716 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16DP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.6 |pwr_conn = C7
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.2 LE, DFS (master), |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/26/2017 |estreldate = 06/09/2017 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833565005 |asin = B077CDGS9S |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B071HHK2PN |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{FCC ST|11/20/2017}} {{see also|eero Home (A010001)}}
===Models=== *'''[[eero A010001]]''' - ''Home Wi-Fi Router'' :[[eero Home (A010001)]] *'''[[eero B010001]]''' - ''Wi-Fi Router/Access Point'' :[[eero Pro (B010001)]] - 2nd Generation *'''[[eero D010001]]''' - ''Wi-Fi Router/Access Point'' :[[eero Beacon (D010001)]] *'''eero B010301''' - ''Pro Wi-Fi System'' :2nd Generation (3x eero) *'''eero M010301''' - ''Home Wi-Fi System'' :2nd Gen (1x eero + 2x eero Beacon) *'''eero M010201''' - ''Home Wi-Fi System'' :2nd Gen (1x eero + 1x eero Beacon)
===Specifications=== *Wired connectivity: '''eero Beacon''': None ports :'''eero 2''': 2x GbE ports for WAN and/or LAN connectivity *Wireless connectivity: Thread 1.1 Border Router :802.11abgn/ac 2x2 MU-MIMO, BT 4.2 LE, Beamforming :'''eero Beacon''': Dual-band Wi-Fi radios (2.4/5.2 GHz) :'''eero 2''': Tri-band Wi-Fi radios (2.4/5.2/5.8 GHz)
==Links of Interest== *[https://blog.eero.com/the-second-generation-of-eero/ Blog] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32962-eero-home-wi-fi-system-reviewed ''eero Home Wi-Fi System reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.techhive.com/article/3204644/network-router/eero-home-wifi-system-2-review-beacons-make-this-system-even-easier-to-install.html ''eero Home WiFi System 2 review'' on '''TechHive'''] *[https://www.theverge.com/2017/6/28/15887698/eero-second-generation-mesh-router-review ''eero (2nd Gen) review'' on '''TheVerge'''] *[http://au.pcmag.com/review/48963/eero-2nd-generation ''eero (2nd Generation)'' on '''PCMag''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/eero-announces-its-next-generation.39632/ ''eero Announces Its Next Generation'' on '''SNB''' forums]
==See also== ► [[List of Wireless Systems]] • [[Qualcomm SON]] • [https://www.pcmag.com/roundup/350795/the-best-wi-fi-mesh-network-systems Wi-Fi Mesh Network Systems] *[[ASUS Lyra]] (MAP-AC2200) - Home Wi-Fi System :AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Networking Wireless Router *[[Amped Wireless ALLY-R2100K]] - Whole Home Smart Wi-Fi System *[[Google Wifi (NLS-1304-25)]] - Home Wi-Fi System *[[EnGenius EnMesh (EMR3000v2)]] - AC1200 Whole Home Wi-Fi System *[[Linksys Velop (WHW03)]] - Tri-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi Mesh Node *[[Luma WRTQ-329ACN]] - Home Wi-Fi System *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR50)]] - AC3000 Tri-Band Wi-Fi System *[[Plume A1A]] - Adaptive Wi-Fi Pod *[[Securifi Almond 3]] - Smart Home Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco M5]] - AC1300 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi HD]] - Home Mesh Wi-Fi System
